title: Second largest city in rank-size rule

content.question: According to the rank-size rule, which of the following is true about the second-largest city in a country?

choices.label: It is almost equal in population to the largest city.
It has a population that is twice the size of the third-largest city.
It has half the number of functions as those in the largest city.
It has half the population size of the largest city.
It is located half as far from the largest city as is the third-largest city.

content.answer: It has half the population size of the largest city.
